metadata.title: CVE-2024-42288 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: qla2xxx: Fix for possible memory corruptionInit Control Block is dereferenced incorrectly.  Correctly dereference ICB

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
